message: This is a really cool idea!

Can you please help us come up with a name?  Please take a few minutes and go through each of these names and let us know if you like or dislike each one. Feel free to suggest new ones also. Thanks!  http://www.google.com/moderator/#16/e=745c0
Thanks :)  We're naming it in a few hours... Already have a bunch of them to sell at Union Square tomorrow, just need to engrave the name.
Getting ready to pick the name, get your votes in now
http://grripz.com is live!  Thanks everyone for voting.
@tinyangel why do you say that?  It works for me...

couldn't access the website but you've got me curious now
